name: Marge & Phil
description:
A short vignette set in an elderly couple's home. Sit and listen, then give your loved ones a call.

There are no interactive elements at this time. Takes 3-5 minutes to experience.  Audio is a large part of the experience so please make sure your volume is up. Thank you for playing.

(Note: the build has not been tested widely yet. I recommend playing at 1920 x1080 resolution and "Ultra" graphics settings from the launcher. Contact me at support@heartshapedgames.com if you run into any problems)
